Class Booking_Panel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  Booking_Panel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Booking_Panel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This is the panel for booking. Users are able to create new appointments. * If an nutritionist or a trainer is booked, no room booking is required. However, if a physiotherapist is booked, the user is asked to further book a room.

Author:
Group 1
See Also:
Serialized Form
